abstract.text: A protocol to which text views conform to asynchronously integrate with the text system.

inlineContent.text: in your text field when you need to perform asynchronous actions to provide information for the text system, for example, making an XPC request to a web content extension.

abstract.text: Create a browser that renders content using an alternative browser engine.
A set of methods that defines extended interactions in browser text views.
A protocol to which text views conform to asynchronously integrate with the text system.

abstract.text: Share content, add replacement shortcuts, and perform other rich actions in browser text views.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A set of methods a responder uses to implement simple text entry.
A set of standard methods that apps can adopt to support editing.
A set of methods that defines features for keyboard input to a text object.
